mapper.select: SELECT bsp.product_name AS productName, bpt.product_sn AS productSn, bsp.image, bpt.id AS productId FROM dj_basics_storefront_product bsp INNER JOIN dj_basics_product_template bpt ON bsp.prod_template_id = bpt.id WHERE bsp.id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dj_basics_storefront_product dbsp INNER JOIN dj_basics_product_template dbpt ON dbsp.prod_template_id=dbpt.id INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods dbg ON dbpt.goods_id=dbg.id AND dbg.type=2 WHERE dbsp.id =#{id}

SELECT bsp.id, bg. NAME AS goodsName, -- 货品名称 bsp.product_name AS productName, -- 商品名称 bg.attribute_id_arr AS attributeIdArr, -- 属性 bsp.is_shelf_status AS isShelfStatus -- 是否上下架 FROM dj_basics_storefront_product bsp INNER JOIN dj_basics_product_template bpt ON bsp.prod_template_id = bpt.id INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods bg ON bsp.goods_id = bg.id where 1=1
and ( bg. NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') or bsp.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyWord},'%') )

SELECT bsp.prod_template_id AS productId, bsp.product_name AS productName, bsp.sell_price AS sellPrice, bsp.image, CONCAT_WS( " ", bb.`name`, bpt.value_name_arr ) AS specificationAttributes FROM dj_basics_storefront_product bsp INNER JOIN dj_basics_product_template bpt ON bsp.prod_template_id = bpt.id INNER JOIN dj_basics_goods bg ON bg.id = bpt.goods_id INNER JOIN dj_basics_brand bb ON bb.id = bg.brand_id WHERE bsp.storefront_id =#{storefrontId} AND bsp.prod_template_id =#{productId}

SELECT bsp.prod_template_id AS productId, bsp.product_name AS productName, bsp.image, bpt.unit_name AS unitName FROM dj_basics_storefront_product bsp INNER JOIN dj_basics_product_template bpt ON bsp.prod_template_id = bpt.id WHERE bsp.prod_template_id =#{productId} and bsp.storefront_id=#{storefrontId}
